en-US.instruction.eligibility.check.list.1: Please select student's course, to find required academic certificates
en-US.instruction.eligibility.check.list.1.sub: **If student's academic year follows semester system, you need to submit marks certificate for each semester**
en-US.instruction.eligibility.check.list.3: Income certificate (less than or equal Rs. 3,00,000.00)
en-US.instruction.eligibility.check.list.4: Bank pass book page showing student's name
en-US.instruction.eligibility.life.member: The referrer should be a LIFE MEMBER
en-US.instruction.guide.lines.referrer.step1: Please read eligibility criteria by clicking below 'Eligibility' button.
en-US.instruction.guide.lines.referrer.step2: If you are a life member, click on 'Refer a Student' button and continue.
en-US.instruction.guide.lines.referrer.step3: Once referral form is submitted then student and member will receive a confirmation email.
en-US.instruction.guide.lines.student.step1: If you have received a confirmation code, click on 'Apply' button and continue
en-US.instruction.guide.lines.student.step2: Once application is completed, you need to upload supporting documents in PDF format.
